list.abs: in the detailed text , introduced Shun company intends to lease the space module , lease , rent , payment methods , property management fees , rentfree periods , deposits , rent district transfer situation .在详文中，介绍了顺通公司有意租赁单元的面积、租期、租金、付款方法、物业管理费、免租期、押金、租区

entry.def: If you have a rent-free house or office, you do not have to pay anything to use it.

example.ex: He was given a new rent-free apartment.
example.tran: 他得到了一个新的免租金公寓。
